sd_payload.negative_prompt: (EasyNegative:0.8), (wost quality, low quality:1.4), blurry, blur, bokeh, fog, mist, bloom, (latex, shiny clothes:1.2), tight, skin tight, impossible clothes, white border, impossible body, impossible hand, incorrect fingers
sd_payload.prompt: (masterpiece, best quality, high quality, highres:1.4), extremely detailed, detailed skin, ambient soft lighting, 4K,

functions_prompt.description: use key word to describe a image to make stable diffusion be able to generate image and make music generator be able to generate music.
functions_prompt.name: get_sd_and_musicgen_prompt

bgm_prompt.description: describe the music like: "a light and cheerily EDM track, with syncopated drums, aery pads, and strong emotions bpm: 130", etc.

img_prompt.description: describe the image like: "little dog, gray skin, big eyes, looking at viewer", etc.

openai.img_and_voice_to_prompt:
If we want you according to this image the voice to imagine another picture, what do you think? And if we want you according to this image and the voice to describe a piece of melody, what do you think?
voice:
openai.img_to_comment: This picture is a slice generated by prompt generated by GPT4 and stable diffusion based on prompt. Imagine that you are the author of this image. Now your photos will be displayed in art exhibitions. You need to write a 100-word description of this image that explains your creative concept.
openai.json_fix_prompt: Complete the json syntax errors in the following text according to the legal json format. You don't need to say any thing except the json.
